Description: Lizzy is the leading DMS/BMS for the powersports, OPE, and marine industries.
Name: Lizzy

Methods.Name: List Service History
Methods.Description: Get list of service history records. Returns false if no records found.

Methods.Name: List New Service History
Methods.Description: Get list of service history records since last run. Returns false if no records found.

Methods.Name: List New Serialized Sales
Methods.Description: Get list of new serialized sales since last run. Returns false if no records found.

Methods.Name: List Serialized Sales
Methods.Description: Get list of serialized sales. Returns false if no records found.

Methods.Name: List Part Sales
Methods.Description: Get list of part sales. Returns false if no records found.

Methods.Name: List New Part Sales
Methods.Description: Get list of new part sales since last run. Returns false if no records found.

Methods.Name: Get Invoice
Methods.Description: Get invoice. Returns false if no invoice found.
